On_IN the_DT 24th_JJ of_IN February_NNP ,_, 1815_CD ,_, the_DT look-out_NN at_IN Notre-Dame_NNP de_FW la_FW Garde_FW signalled_VBD the_DT three-master_JJ ,_, the_DT Pharaon_NNP from_IN Smyrna_NNP ,_, Trieste_NNP ,_, and_CC Naples_NNP ._. As_IN usual_JJ ,_, a_DT pilot_NN put_VBD off_RP immediately_RB ,_, and_CC rounding_VBG the_DT Chateau_NNP d'If_NNP ,_, got_VBD on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN between_IN Cape_NNP Morgion_NNP and_CC Rion_NNP island_NN ._. Immediately_RB ,_, and_CC according_VBG to_TO custom_NN ,_, the_DT ramparts_NNS of_IN Fort_NNP Saint-Jean_NNP were_VBD covered_VBN with_IN spectators_NNS ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ always_RB an_DT event_NN at_IN Marseilles_NNP for_IN a_DT ship_NN to_TO come_VB into_IN port_NN ,_, especially_RB when_WRB this_DT ship_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT Pharaon_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN built_VBN ,_, rigged_VBD ,_, and_CC laden_JJ at_IN the_DT old_JJ Phocee_NNP docks_VBZ ,_, and_CC belongs_VBZ to_TO an_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. The_DT ship_NN drew_VBD on_IN and_CC had_VBD safely_RB passed_VBN the_DT strait_NN ,_, which_WDT some_DT volcanic_JJ shock_NN has_VBZ made_VBN between_IN the_DT Calasareigne_NN and_CC Jaros_NNP islands_NNS ;_: had_VBD doubled_VBN Pomegue_NNP ,_, and_CC approached_VBD the_DT harbor_NN under_IN topsails_NNS ,_, jib_NN ,_, and_CC spanker_NN ,_, but_CC so_RB slowly_RB and_CC sedately_RB that_IN the_DT idlers_NNS ,_, with_IN that_DT instinct_NN which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT forerunner_NN of_IN evil_NN ,_, asked_VBD one_CD another_DT what_WDT misfortune_NN could_MD have_VB happened_VBN on_IN board_NN ._. The_DT vague_JJ disquietude_NN which_WDT prevailed_VBD among_IN the_DT spectators_NNS had_VBD so_RB much_JJ affected_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT crowd_NN that_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB await_VB the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN in_IN harbor_NN ,_, but_CC jumping_VBG into_IN a_DT small_JJ skiff_NN ,_, desired_VBN to_TO be_VB pulled_VBN alongside_IN the_DT Pharaon_NNP ,_, which_WDT he_PRP reached_VBD as_IN she_PRP rounded_VBD into_IN La_NNP Reserve_NNP basin_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT young_JJ man_NN on_IN board_NN saw_VBD this_DT person_NN approach_NN ,_, he_PRP left_VBD his_PRP$ station_NN by_IN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, hat_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, leaned_VBD over_IN the_DT ship_NN 's_POS bulwarks_NNS ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT fine_NN ,_, tall_JJ ,_, slim_JJ young_JJ fellow_NN of_IN eighteen_CD or_CC twenty_CD ,_, with_IN black_JJ eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC hair_NN as_IN dark_JJ as_IN a_DT raven_NN 's_POS wing_NN ;_: and_CC his_PRP$ whole_JJ appearance_NN bespoke_NN that_WDT calmness_NN and_CC resolution_NN peculiar_JJ to_TO men_NNS accustomed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ cradle_NN to_TO contend_VB with_IN danger_NN ._. ``_`` Ah_UH ,_, is_VBZ it_PRP you_PRP ,_, Dantes_NNP ?_. The_DT Young_NNP Amelia_NNP had_VBD a_DT very_RB active_JJ crew_NN ,_, very_RB obedient_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ captain_NN ,_, who_WP lost_VBD as_RB little_JJ time_NN as_IN possible_JJ ._. He_PRP had_VBD scarcely_RB been_VBN a_DT week_NN at_IN Leghorn_NNP before_IN the_DT hold_NN of_IN his_PRP$ vessel_NN was_VBD filled_VBN with_IN printed_VBN muslins_NNS ,_, contraband_NN cottons_NNS ,_, English_NNP powder_NN ,_, and_CC tobacco_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT excise_NN had_VBD forgotten_VBN to_TO put_VB its_PRP$ mark_NN ._. The_DT next_JJ morning_NN going_VBG on_IN deck_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP always_RB did_VBD at_IN an_DT early_JJ hour_NN ,_, the_DT patron_NN found_VBD Dantes_NNP leaning_VBG against_IN the_DT bulwarks_NNS gazing_VBG with_IN intense_JJ earnestness_NN at_IN a_DT pile_NN of_IN granite_NN rocks_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT rising_VBG sun_NN tinged_VBN with_IN rosy_JJ light_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT Island_NN of_IN Monte_NNP Cristo_NNP ._. The_DT Young_NNP Amelia_NNP left_VBD it_PRP three-quarters_NNS of_IN a_DT league_NN to_TO the_DT larboard_NN ,_, and_CC kept_VBD on_IN for_IN Corsica_NNP ._. Dantes_NNP thought_VBD ,_, as_IN they_PRP passed_VBD so_RB closely_RB to_TO the_DT island_NN whose_WP$ name_NN was_VBD so_RB interesting_JJ to_TO him_PRP ,_, that_IN he_PRP had_VBD only_RB to_TO leap_VB into_IN the_DT sea_NN and_CC in_IN half_PDT an_DT hour_NN be_VB at_IN the_DT promised_JJ land_NN ._. But_CC then_RB what_WP could_MD he_PRP do_VB without_IN instruments_NNS to_TO discover_VB his_PRP$ treasure_NN ,_, without_IN arms_NNS to_TO defend_VB himself_PRP ?_. Besides_IN ,_, what_WP would_MD the_DT sailors_NNS say_VB ?_. What_WP would_MD the_DT patron_NN think_VB ?_. He_PRP must_MD wait_VB ._. Fortunately_RB ,_, Dantes_NNP had_VBD learned_VBN how_WRB to_TO wait_VB ;_: he_PRP had_VBD waited_VBN fourteen_CD years_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ liberty_NN ,_, and_CC now_RB he_PRP was_VBD free_JJ he_PRP could_MD wait_VB at_IN least_JJS six_CD months_NNS or_CC a_DT year_NN for_IN wealth_NN ._. Would_MD he_PRP not_RB have_VBP accepted_VBN liberty_NN without_IN riches_NNS if_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN offered_VBN to_TO him_PRP ?_. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, the_DT letter_NN of_IN the_DT Cardinal_NNP Spada_NNP was_VBD singularly_RB circumstantial_JJ ,_, and_CC Dantes_NNP repeated_VBD it_PRP to_TO himself_PRP ,_, from_IN one_CD end_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ ,_, for_IN he_PRP had_VBD not_RB forgotten_VBN a_DT word_NN ._. The_DT second_JJ operation_NN was_VBD as_RB successful_JJ as_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, The_DT Young_NNP Amelia_NNP was_VBD in_IN luck_NN ._. ''_'' He_PRP had_VBD ,_, moreover_RB ,_, looked_VBD upon_IN the_DT customs_NNS officer_NN wounded_VBN to_TO death_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, whether_IN from_IN heat_NN of_IN blood_NN produced_VBN by_IN the_DT encounter_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT chill_NN of_IN human_JJ sentiment_NN ,_, this_DT sight_NN had_VBD made_VBN but_CC slight_JJ impression_NN upon_IN him_PRP ._. This_DT world_NN was_VBD not_RB then_RB so_RB good_JJ as_IN Doctor_NNP Pangloss_NNP believed_VBD it_PRP ,_, neither_CC was_VBD it_PRP so_RB wicked_JJ as_IN Dantes_NNP thought_VBD it_PRP ,_, since_IN this_DT man_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD nothing_NN to_TO expect_VB from_IN his_PRP$ comrade_NN but_CC the_DT inheritance_NN of_IN his_PRP$ share_NN of_IN the_DT prize-money_NN ,_, manifested_VBN so_RB much_JJ sorrow_NN when_WRB he_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP fall_VB ._. Edmond_NNP then_RB resolved_VBD to_TO try_VB Jacopo_NNP ,_, and_CC offered_VBD him_PRP in_IN return_NN for_IN his_PRP$ attention_NN a_DT share_NN of_IN his_PRP$ prize-money_NN ,_, but_CC Jacopo_NNP refused_VBD it_PRP indignantly_RB ._. And_CC from_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT kindness_NN which_WDT Edmond_NNP showed_VBD him_PRP was_VBD enough_RB for_IN the_DT brave_VBP seaman_NN ._. ''_'' Edmond_NNP replied_VBD ,_, ``_`` Who_WP knows_VBZ ?_. You_PRP may_MD one_CD day_NN be_VB the_DT captain_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN ._. He_PRP then_RB formed_VBD a_DT resolution_NN ._. But_CC in_IN this_DT world_NN we_PRP must_MD risk_VB something_NN ._. Dantes_NNP was_VBD tossed_VBN about_RB on_IN these_DT doubts_NNS and_CC wishes_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT patron_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD great_JJ confidence_NN in_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC was_VBD very_RB desirous_JJ of_IN retaining_VBG him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ service_NN ,_, took_VBD him_PRP by_IN the_DT arm_NN one_CD evening_NN and_CC led_VBD him_PRP to_TO a_DT tavern_NN on_IN the_DT Via_NNP del_NNP '_POS Oglio_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT leading_VBG smugglers_NNS of_IN Leghorn_NNP used_VBD to_TO congregate_VB and_CC discuss_VB affairs_NNS connected_VBN with_IN their_PRP$ trade_NN ._. Already_RB Dantes_NNP had_VBD visited_VBN this_DT maritime_NN Bourse_NNP two_CD or_CC three_CD times_NNS ,_, and_CC seeing_VBG all_PDT these_DT hardy_JJ free-traders_NNS ,_, who_WP supplied_VBD the_DT whole_JJ coast_NN for_IN nearly_RB two_CD hundred_CD leagues_NNS in_IN extent_NN ,_, he_PRP had_VBD asked_VBN himself_PRP what_WP power_NN might_MD not_RB that_DT man_NN attain_VB who_WP should_MD give_VB the_DT impulse_NN of_IN his_PRP$ will_MD to_TO all_DT these_DT contrary_JJ and_CC diverging_VBG minds_NNS ._. This_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT great_JJ matter_NN that_WDT was_VBD under_IN discussion_NN ,_, connected_VBN with_IN a_DT vessel_NN laden_JJ with_IN Turkey_NNP carpets_NNS ,_, stuffs_NNS of_IN the_DT Levant_NNP ,_, and_CC cashmeres_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO find_VB some_DT neutral_JJ ground_NN on_IN which_WDT an_DT exchange_NN could_MD be_VB made_VBN ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO try_VB and_CC land_VB these_DT goods_NNS on_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN France_NNP ._. If_IN the_DT venture_NN was_VBD successful_JJ the_DT profit_NN would_MD be_VB enormous_JJ ,_, there_EX would_MD be_VB a_DT gain_NN of_IN fifty_CD or_CC sixty_CD piastres_NNS each_DT for_IN the_DT crew_NN ._. The_DT patron_NN of_IN The_DT Young_JJ Amelia_NNP proposed_VBD as_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN landing_VBG the_DT Island_NN of_IN Monte_NNP Cristo_NNP ,_, which_WDT being_VBG completely_RB deserted_VBN ,_, and_CC having_VBG neither_CC soldiers_NNS nor_CC revenue_NN officers_NNS ,_, seemed_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT ocean_NN since_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT heathen_NN Olympus_NNP by_IN Mercury_NNP ,_, the_DT god_NN of_IN merchants_NNS and_CC robbers_NNS ,_, classes_NNS of_IN mankind_NN which_WDT we_PRP in_IN modern_JJ times_NNS have_VBP separated_VBN if_IN not_RB made_VBN distinct_JJ ,_, but_CC which_WDT antiquity_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB included_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ category_NN ._. At_IN the_DT mention_NN of_IN Monte_NNP Cristo_NNP Dantes_NNP started_VBD with_IN joy_NN ;_: he_PRP rose_VBD to_TO conceal_VB his_PRP$ emotion_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD a_DT turn_NN around_IN the_DT smoky_JJ tavern_NN ,_, where_WRB all_PDT the_DT languages_NNS of_IN the_DT known_JJ world_NN were_VBD jumbled_VBN in_IN a_DT lingua_NN franca_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP again_RB joined_VBD the_DT two_CD persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN discussing_VBG the_DT matter_NN ,_, it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN decided_VBN that_IN they_PRP should_MD touch_VB at_IN Monte_NNP Cristo_NNP and_CC set_VBN out_RP on_IN the_DT following_VBG night_NN ._. Edmond_NNP ,_, being_VBG consulted_VBN ,_, was_VBD of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT island_NN afforded_VBD every_DT possible_JJ security_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN great_JJ enterprises_NNS to_TO be_VB well_RB done_VBN should_MD be_VB done_VBN quickly_RB ._. Nothing_NN then_RB was_VBD altered_VBN in_IN the_DT plan_NN ,_, and_CC orders_NNS were_VBD given_VBN to_TO get_VB under_IN weigh_VB next_JJ night_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, wind_NN and_CC weather_NN permitting_VBG ,_, to_TO make_VB the_DT neutral_JJ island_NN by_IN the_DT following_VBG day_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, at_IN length_NN ,_, by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT unexpected_JJ strokes_NNS of_IN fortune_NN which_WDT sometimes_RB befall_VBP those_DT who_WP have_VBP for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN been_VBN the_DT victims_NNS of_IN an_DT evil_JJ destiny_NN ,_, Dantes_NNP was_VBD about_IN to_TO secure_VB the_DT opportunity_NN he_PRP wished_VBD for_IN ,_, by_IN simple_JJ and_CC natural_JJ means_NNS ,_, and_CC land_NN on_IN the_DT island_NN without_IN incurring_VBG any_DT suspicion_NN ._. One_CD night_NN more_JJR and_CC he_PRP would_MD be_VB on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN ._. The_DT night_NN was_VBD one_CD of_IN feverish_JJ distraction_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN its_PRP$ progress_NN visions_NNS good_JJ and_CC evil_JJ passed_VBN through_IN Dantes_NNP '_POS mind_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP closed_VBD his_PRP$ eyes_NNS ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD Cardinal_NNP Spada_NNP 's_POS letter_NN written_VBN on_IN the_DT wall_NN in_IN characters_NNS of_IN flame_NN --_: if_IN he_PRP slept_VBD for_IN a_DT moment_NN the_DT wildest_JJS dreams_NNS haunted_VBD his_PRP$ brain_NN ._. He_PRP ascended_VBD into_IN grottos_NNS paved_VBN with_IN emeralds_NNS ,_, with_IN panels_NNS of_IN rubies_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT roof_NN glowing_JJ with_IN diamond_NN stalactites_NNS ._. Pearls_NNS fell_VBD drop_NN by_IN drop_NN ,_, as_IN subterranean_JJ waters_NNS filter_NN in_IN their_PRP$ caves_NNS ._. Edmond_NNP ,_, amazed_VBN ,_, wonderstruck_NN ,_, filled_VBD his_PRP$ pockets_NNS with_IN the_DT radiant_JJ gems_NNS and_CC then_RB returned_VBD to_TO daylight_NN ,_, when_WRB be_VB discovered_VBN that_IN his_PRP$ prizes_NNS had_VBD all_RB changed_VBN into_IN common_JJ pebbles_NNS ._. He_PRP then_RB endeavored_VBD to_TO re-enter_VB the_DT marvellous_JJ grottos_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP had_VBD suddenly_RB receded_VBN ,_, and_CC now_RB the_DT path_NN became_VBD a_DT labyrinth_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT entrance_NN vanished_VBD ,_, and_CC in_IN vain_JJ did_VBD he_PRP tax_VB his_PRP$ memory_NN for_IN the_DT magic_NN and_CC mysterious_JJ word_NN which_WDT opened_VBD the_DT splendid_JJ caverns_NNS of_IN Ali_NNP Baba_NNP to_TO the_DT Arabian_JJ fisherman_NN ._. The_DT month_NN passed_VBD ,_, and_CC Morrel_NNP made_VBD extraordinary_JJ efforts_NNS to_TO get_VB in_IN all_DT his_PRP$ resources_NNS ._. Morrel_NNP now_RB tried_VBD to_TO negotiate_VB bills_NNS at_IN ninety_CD days_NNS only_RB ,_, and_CC none_NN of_IN the_DT banks_NNS would_MD give_VB him_PRP credit_NN ._.
